name: Twenty years
text:
PART II.  REAL ACTIONS

     No person shall commence an action to recover possession of any lands, or make any entry thereon, unless within twenty years after the right to bring the action first accrued. [L 1870, c 22, §1; am L 1898, c 19, §1; RL 1925, §2657; RL 1935, §3928; RL 1945, §10439; RL 1955, §241-30; HRS ; am L 1973, c 26, §4]
